page.title: 18Elgin's Influence On Birnie.
page.content: Birnie has very few amenities_ there are no shops, garages, post offices, schools or cinemas. The people of Birnie,travel to Elgin the nearest shopping centre for most of their needs and enjoy travelling the short distance to Elgin for their leisure activities. The most popular shops are,Woolworth, Fine Fare Superstore, Halfords, Emslies sports and Boots the Chemist. The people of Birnie can enjoy the following leisure activities in Elgin_golf, putting, tennis, football, boating, disco and much more at the library, community centre and the town hall.
